snippet.title: Hyperlight Ultimate - Launch Trailer (Nintendo Switch ™)
snippet.description:
Hyperlight is an high intensity arcade action game in which you control a spaceship that fights against hordes of evil alien monsters in a virtual cosmic environment. 

Your spaceship has a special capability: It can travel at a Faster-Than-Light speed (F.T.L.) becoming itself the final weapon! By colliding with enemies in this state the ship can instantly destroy everything it touches! 

In the game there are also plenty of other bonus, weapons and entities that can help you overcome the many difficulties you’ll be facing, including battles against the terrific final bosses that await you on the dark side of the universe!

This is the definitive version of the game that includes a refined gameplay and enhanced HD graphics rich in special effects previously not possible in the Nintendo 3DS™ edition. It also features local multiplayer up to 4 players (both co-op and VS) and an online global ranking system.

Are you ready to sprint into the fastest, frantic and insane high-intensity experience that Hyperlight has ever offered?

Hyperlight Ultimate includes many other new features!

Ultimate Edition Features:
- HD graphics boosted with beautiful special effects (@60fps).
- Refined gameplay with several additions and optimizations. 
- Weapons storing for use at will for a more tactical gameplay.
- Arcade mode with 50+ levels and 12 boss fight!
- 2 Players local co-op mode in Arcade, Infinity and Panic game modes.
- 4 Players local VS battles thanks to a new game mode!
- New Online leaderboards with a global ranking system.
- Full HD Rumble™ support.
- All play-style supported: Handheld, Docked, Tabletop.
- Touch controls to play without Joy-Cons™.
